items.title: Upload Your Image

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about creating animated avatars with WaveSpeed AI

items.title: What types of images work best for creating animated avatars?
items.description: High-resolution images with clear, well-lit faces yield the best results for animation. Portraits generally work better than full-body shots.

items.title: Is there a cost to use the animated avatar feature?
items.description: Yes! Each user gets a free trial with credits. For extended use, we offer affordable subscription plans that unlock more features and animations.

items.title: Can I use my animated avatars commercially?
items.description: Absolutely! Users with a paid subscription can utilize their avatars for professional projects and branding purposes.

items.title: How does WaveSpeed ensure privacy during the animation process?
items.description: All processing is done directly in your browser, meaning your images are never uploaded to the cloud or stored elsewhere. Once you finish, all data is deleted.

footer.heading: Ready to Animate Your Avatar?
footer.description: Start creating impressively animated avatars now, and see the magic happen. No registration needed.
